Articles.Content:
Just watched the FLoB-athon update video and heard several KSP devs are going to be guests! May I ask if you guys are willing to come forward what day will you be on so I can try my hardest to see it?

Edited August 13, 2012 by GOOMH

First, you beat me to posting the thread

Second, WAHOO ALL MY FAVORITE STUFF AT ONCE.

Games

Squad (Your voices. MUST. KNOW. NOW.)

A bunch of other people that are hilarious

An excuse to stay indoors
Yeah, the only part I'll really be interested in is Kurt pressing F3.

I got my guess though technically I submitted two but they're the same number I just forgot to put my city into the form due to chrome's retarded autofill messing everything up! Anyway I'm I'll be there if I can make it under the same name here in chat Anyway I'm pumped.

Edited August 10, 2012 by GOOMH
It just started for those who care at: http://www.twitch.tv/kurtjmac

It just started for those who care at: http://www.twitch.tv/kurtjmac

He is still playing the game of blocks. Any Schedule for the KSP stuff?
Heh, somehow I like this better than TV. Multiple monitors FTW, this will run along for a while...

He is still playing the game of blocks. Any Schedule for the KSP stuff?

He'll be playing Minecraft for most of these streams but if he plays KSP I'll post here along with a reminder when the KSP devs come one since they are scheduled for today.
KSP Devs are about to go on the stream
The KSP devs are on now at: http://www.twitch.tv/kurtjmac !
I'll keep this stickied for as long as it goes on.
I'll be there in a little bit.
Thank you for the sticky Damny. So far it's been entertaining and I've learned quite a bit about squads history.
Dang I missed some of it!

Stuff which is streamed on twitch.tv usually is made available later as VOD

http://de.twitch.tv/kurtjmac/b/328128129 this should be it. If anyone who watched it could point out the part with KSP it'd be great.
Guys! Get on to Kurt's livestream! Currently he's got half of SQUAD and Scott Manley on Skype!
Its really good stuff... Specially the interactions between the different members of the squad team.

It was a good stream today a bunch of the Devs and various other KSP staff showed up and talked about many various topics. Anyway just a reminder it's a 3 day stream and another stream begins tomorrow at 1 pm CDT which is -5 GMT and -6 BST.

dam so annoyed i missed this i only managed to catch the 10 mins or so with squad would of really like to see what Scott had to say.

Oh well never mind

dam so annoyed i missed this i only managed to catch the 10 mins or so with squad would of really like to see what Scott had to say.

Oh well never mind

Kurt has you covered, the video is here --> http://www.twitch.tv/kurtjmac/b/328128129

The KSP team joins the chat starting at 3:26

dam so annoyed i missed this i only managed to catch the 10 mins or so with squad would of really like to see what Scott had to say.

Oh well never mind

Scott had sound/connection issues and didn't stay, unfortunately. I think Kurt mentioned hoping to get him back over the weekend when things are more stable on Scott's end.
Quick heads up to those who care, Kurt is live once again! Let day two of the FLoB-Athon begin!

Day three of the FLOB-athon!

KSP devs didn't join today... but we raised 240% of the original goal for child's play charity!!

This equates to over 70,000$!!! Grats to all the donators! (plus the 11k from last season for a grand total)

Some sad things happened near the end that will effect future FLOB episodes. But I don't want to spoil it for people that didn't watch.
Heh, yeah I think the fans are taking that bad news too hard. Congrats to Kurt, though, that was an incredible amount raised in that last day!

Would someone PM me what happened?

Did Wolfie die?
